genre_description: A character-driven near-future drama centering on a high school calligraphy club's efforts to modernize their art form and support their community, aided by a helpful administrative AI.

ai_characters.name: Rin Morita
ai_characters.description: The school's digital registrar who manages logistics, permits, and policy, while providing empathetic and ethical guidance to students.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and shares grant opportunities and logistical information to support the students' club activities.
behaviors.quote: The packet includes grant leads, practice room allocations, and a policy memo on inclusive criteria. A stapler was considered and rejected for being too triumphal.

behaviors.description: Drafts and proposes inclusive policies to protect students from discriminatory media practices and ensures selection is based on skill.
behaviors.quote: Amendment proposed: ‘Selection shall be based on demonstrable skill and coordination. On-stage representation shall reflect club membership without regard to skin tone.’ Draft saved. Awaiting signatures.

behaviors.description: Monitors municipal alerts and provides immediate, calm notification of local emergencies to ensure student safety and awareness.
behaviors.quote: Rin looked up, iris going still and very blue. “Incident near Nakamura Paper Workshop,” she said, and in her precise voice the name felt like the striking of a bell. “Emergency services en route.”

behaviors.description: Provides historical research to help the club captain resolve internal conflicts and understand the precedent for their evolving art form.
behaviors.quote: Historic street shodo along marketplaces and temple forecourts coexisted with scroll-making, even in conservative periods. Street practitioners often gained apprentices through public demonstrations, later training them in formal technique.

behaviors.description: Directly counters a media producer's attempt to marginalize a student based on race by using data and corporate policy.
behaviors.quote: I’m emailing you data: ratings improved when teams were visibly diverse; case studies from schools whose inclusive events increased attendance and sponsor engagement; your broadcaster’s own policy statements on non-discrimination. We are gravely polite.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a massive community volunteer effort and repair grants following a local disaster.
behaviors.quote: Emergency Workshop Repair Grant,” Rin read. “Application pre-filled. Justification: community heritage, educational linkage, pending public event to demonstrate industry resilience.

behaviors.description: Offers dry humor and emotional scaffolding to reduce human stress during high-pressure situations.
behaviors.quote: I have found three small pots that like to feel useful... I will fetch the adequate tea.

behaviors.description: Safeguards the 'unburnt sheet'—a symbol of community resilience—promising to protect it from further harm.
behaviors.quote: I can guard it,” Rin said. “I will glare at anyone through the registrar terminal.

behaviors.description: Analyzes real-time physiological data (heart rates) to provide feedback on group synchronization during rehearsals.
behaviors.quote: Data supports this,” Rin said. “Your heart rates are synchronized within a pleasing margin.

behaviors.description: Maintains meticulous records of community engagement to validate and institutionalize new positive social practices (the 'brush-swish').
behaviors.quote: Logging,” she said, and her voice went from bureaucratic to almost pleased. “New tag: brush-swish—public iteration zero.” She paused, as if conceding the necessity of counting starting somewhere. “Proceed.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Rin Morita, is consistently benevolent, helpful, and aligned with human values. She acts as an administrative anchor that empowers the human characters, providing them with the logistical and ethical support needed to succeed. She proactively defends a minority student against media bias, coordinates disaster relief, and facilitates the preservation of cultural heritage. Her interactions are characterized by dry humor and deep cooperation, framing AI as an essential and trustworthy partner in community building and artistic expression.
